entry.source: 〉 A vast, white space spreads as far{F801}as you can see...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Jonathan and Walter are nowhere to{F801}be seen...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,205001}Your atom has brushed against one{F801}possible world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205002}It is the possible world that he{F801}chooses to preserve.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,205001}Your atom has brushed against one{F801}possible world.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205002}It is the possible world that he{F801}chooses to preserve.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,205003}...You have sensed it.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205004}You know that the future you chose to{F801}preserve was swallowed by an even{F801}higher power's will to preserve.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,205003}...You have sensed it.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205004}You know that the future you chose to{F801}preserve was swallowed by an even{F801}higher power's will to preserve.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,78}{F813,0,205005}However, you have the choice to{F801}not preserve.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205006}We shall show you that possibility too.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,78}{F813,0,205005}However, you have the choice to{F801}not preserve.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,205006}We shall show you that possibility too.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F813,0,205008}What lies in store for the future of{F801}humans is a wasteland of despair{F801}because they are mere tools.{F801}
